column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This is a great spot for most occasions! We showed up around 7:45 as walk ins and waited about 30-45 minutes for a table. We ordered the passion fruit sangria and snacked on some complimentary bread before deciding on the beef tenderloin with blue cheese
column2: chicken empanada and spicy potatoes. I usually order these as well as a few more items
column3: but yesterday we were really in the mood for some sangria! We had the truffle cake for dessert
column4: which did not disappoint. Service was prompt and waters were always full. The spicy potatoes never came
column5: but it was one of those "for the best" moments because we were already full. This is one of those places that I will always come back to!
